Second, improvements in the coverage of detailed marine charting and navigational information is needed in vulnerable and heavy traffic regions to improve safety of shipping. Investments are specifically needed in the Arctic Archipelago, Hudson Bay, and Inuvialuit regions where vulnerability is projected to increase the most. Additionally, small ports have potential to reduce risks, especially in Inuvialuit
